info.title: Azure Database for MySQL
info.description: Azure Database for MySQL Flexible Server provides a fully managed database service for app development and deployment with built-in capabilities, such as high availability, at no extra cost. Connect to Azure database for MySQL Flexible Server databases to read and write data.

get.description: This operation gets metadata for a table.

get.summary: Get table metadata for Post operation
get.description: Get table metadata for Post operation

get.summary: Get table metadata for Patch operation
get.description: Get table metadata for Patch operation
This operation gets all datasets available to the connection.
This operation gets tables from a database.

get.summary: Get tables for On Item Created
get.description: Get tables for On Item Created

get.summary: Get tables for On Item Updated
get.description: Get tables for On Item Updated
This operation gets rows from a table.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum number of entries to retrieve (default = 512).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

post.description: This operation inserts a new row into a table.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Row to insert into the specified table

get.description: This operation gets a row from a table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to retrieve

delete.description: This operation deletes a row from a table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to delete

patch.description: This operation updates an existing row in a table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to update

get.description: Triggers a flow when an item is created in MySQL

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

parameters.name: x-ms-operation-context
parameters.description: Special header to enable operation simulation

get.description: Triggers a flow when an item is modified/inserted in MySQL

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

sortable.description: Indicates whether this table has sortable columns

ascendingOnlyProperties.description: List of properties which support ascending order only

filterable.description: Indicates whether this table has filterable columns

selectable.description: Indicates whether this table has selectable columns

Name.description: The name of the server. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the server.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional server properties provided by the connector to the clients.

Name.description: The name of the database. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the database.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional database properties provided by the connector to the clients.

Name.description: The name of the table. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the table.
